column1: Artificial Intelligence and Adaptive Systems (with an industrial placement year) - MSc
column5: The study of natural and artificial intelligent and adaptive systems is at the heart of rapidly developing areas. These range from artificial intelligence and autonomous robotics to neuroscience, consciousness and cognitive science. This MSc prepares you for research and development in intelligent and adaptive systems. You'll cover theoretical issues and practical techniques for their design and implementation. You can choose to organise your studies around one of these areas:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
